function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High occupancy in living rooms from 2:00 to 10:00 p.m. increases the risk of disease transmission due to close contact.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission within the living rooms.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, increasing ventilation, and regular cleaning and disinfection of living room surfaces.","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, UV-C disinfection devices, occupancy tracking sensors.","People":"Occupants of the living rooms.","Owner":"Building management, occupants."},{"Description":"Peak occupancy in the kitchen for lunch and dinner preparation increases the risk of disease transmission during meal preparation times.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission during meal preparation.","Mitigation":"Implementing hygiene protocols, promoting handwashing, and using antimicrobial surfaces in the kitchen.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial materials, touchless faucets, sensor-activated lights.","People":"Occupants and food handlers in the kitchen.","Owner":"Building management, occupants, food service staff."},{"Description":"High occupancy in the bathrooms during morning routines increases the risk of disease transmission due to shared use of facilities.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission during morning routines.","Mitigation":"Enhancing ventilation, promoting personal hygiene practices, providing hand hygiene stations in the bathrooms.","Technologies":"Automatic air fresheners, touchless soap dispensers, antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Occupants using the bathrooms during morning routines.","Owner":"Building management, occupants."}]}
